fluff.name: Expert Sidekick
entries: The expert is a master of certain tasks or knowledge. This sidekick follows a path that favors cunning over brawn or spellcasting. It might be a scout, a musician, a librarian, a clever street kid, a wily merchant, or a burglar.

entries: A Warrior sidekick grows in martial prowess as it fights by your side. It might be a soldier, a town guard, a battle-trained beast, or any other creature honed for combat.

classFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 1}
The sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw (escull): Destresa, Intel·ligència, or Carisma.

A més, the sidekick gains proficiency in five skills (escull), and it gains proficiency with light armor. If it is a humanoid or has una arma simple o marcial in its stat block, it also gains proficiency with all simple weapons and with two tools (escull).

classFeature.name: Helpful
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 1}
The sidekick is adept at giving well-timed assistance; the sidekick can take l'acció {@action Ajudar} com a acció bonus.

classFeature.name: Sidekick Class
entries: To gain the Expert class, a creature must have at least one language in its stat block that it can speak.
{@note Note: this class is intended for NPC {@variantrule sidekicks|tce}.}

classFeature.name: Acció Astuta
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 2}
The sidekick's agility or quick thinking allows it to act speedily. On its turn in combat, it can take l'acció {@action Córrer}, {@action Destravar-se}, or {@action Amagar-se} com a acció bonus.

classFeature.name: Perícia
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 3}
Choose two of the sidekick's skill proficiencies. The sidekick's proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check it makes that uses any of the chosen proficiencies.
A nivell 15, choose two more of the sidekick's skill proficiencies per rebre aquest benefici.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 4}

Als nivells 4, 8, 10, 12, 16, i 19, the sidekick increases one ability score (escull) by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores (escull) by 1. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Coordinated Strike
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 6}

The sidekick is adept at fighting in concert with a companion. When the sidekick uses its Helpful feature to aid an ally in attacking a creature, that target can be fins a 30 peus away from the sidekick, and the sidekick can deal an extra {@damage 2d6} damage to it the next time the sidekick hits it with an attack roll before the end of the current turn. The extra damage is the same type of damage dealt by the attack.

classFeature.name: Evasió
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 7}

Because of extraordinary good luck, the sidekick is skilled at avoiding danger. When the sidekick is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed. The sidekick doesn't benefit from this feature while {@condition incapacitated}.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 8}

Als nivells 4, 8, 10, 12, 16, i 19, the sidekick increases one ability score (escull) by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores (escull) by 1. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 10}

Als nivells 4, 8, 10, 12, 16, i 19, the sidekick increases one ability score (escull) by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores (escull) by 1. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Inspiring Help
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 11}

When the sidekick takes l'acció {@action Ajudar}, the creature who receives the help also gains a {@dice 1d6} bonus to the {@dice d20} roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then si impactes, the creature can add the bonus to the attack's damage roll against un objectiu.
A nivell 20, el bonus es torna {@dice 2d6}.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 12}

Als nivells 4, 8, 10, 12, 16, i 19, the sidekick increases one ability score (escull) by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores (escull) by 1. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Talent de Confiança
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 14}

The sidekick has refined its skills to an exceptional degree. Whenever the sidekick makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a {@dice d20} roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 16}

Als nivells 4, 8, 10, 12, 16, i 19, the sidekick increases one ability score (escull) by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores (escull) by 1. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Sharp Mind
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 18}
The sidekick gains proficiency in one of the following saving throws (escull): Intel·ligència, Saviesa, or Carisma.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 19}

Als nivells 4, 8, 10, 12, 16, i 19, the sidekick increases one ability score (escull) by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores (escull) by 1. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

classFeature.name: Inspiring Help Improvement
entries: {@i tret de Expert a nivell 20}
A nivell 20, the bonus dice granted by the sidekick's Inspiring Help increases to {@dice 2d6}.

classFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: {@i tret de Spellcaster a nivell 1}
The sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw (escull): Saviesa, Intel·ligència, or Carisma.

A més, the sidekick gains proficiency in two skills (escull) from the following list: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Performance}, {@skill Persuasion}, i {@skill Religion}.
The sidekick gains proficiency with light armor, and if it is a humanoid or has una arma simple o marcial in its stat block, it also gains proficiency with all simple weapons.

classFeature.name: Sidekick Class
entries: To gain the Spellcaster class, a creature must have at least one language in its stat block that it can speak.
{@note Note: this class is intended for NPC {@variantrule sidekicks|tce}.}

classFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: {@i tret de Spellcaster a nivell 1}

The sidekick gains the ability to cast spells. (If the creature already has the Spellcasting trait, this feature replaces that trait.) Choose the Spellcaster's role: Mage, Healer, or Prodigy. This choice determines the spell list and habilitat de llançament de conjurs used by the sidekick, as shown on the Spellcasting table.

entries.name: Ranures de Conjur
entries: The Spellcaster table shows how many ranures de conjur the sidekick has to cast its Spellcaster spells de nivells 1 i superior. To cast one of these spells, the sidekick must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. The sidekick regains all expended ranures de conjur when it finishes a long rest.

entries.name: Spells Known
entries: The sidekick knows two cantrips and one 1st-level spell (escull) from its spell list. Here are recommendations for a 1st-level spellcaster of each role:

items.name: Mage:
items.entry: {@spell mà de mag}, {@spell raig gebre}, {@spell tronada}

items.name: Prodigy:
items.entry: {@spell eldritch blast}, {@spell paraula de curació}, {@spell llum}

items: The Cantrips Known and Columna de Conjurs Conegutss of the Spellcaster table shows when the sidekick learns more spells (escull). Each of the spells in the Columna de Conjurs Coneguts must be of a level for which the sidekick has ranures de conjur, as shown on the table. For instance, when the sidekick reaches 5th level en aquesta classe, it can learn one new spell of 1st or 2nd level.

A més, when the sidekick gains a level en aquesta classe, you can choose one of the spells it knows from this class and replace it with another spell from its spell list. The new spell must be a cantrip or of a level for which the sidekick has ranures de conjur.

entries.name: Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: The sidekick's habilitat de llançament de conjurs for these spells depends on the choice you made on the Spellcasting table.

The sidekick uses its habilitat de llançament de conjurs whenever a spell refers to that ability. A més, it uses its modificador d'habilitat de llançament de conjurs when setting the saving throw DC for a spell it casts and when making an attack roll with one.

entries.name: Focus de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: The sidekick can use a focus for its spells depending on the choice you made on the Spellcasting table. A Mage can use an arcane focus, a Priest can use a holy symbol, and a Prodigy can use an arcane focus or a {@item musical instrument|PHB}.

classFeature.name: Truc Potents
entries: {@i tret de Spellcaster a nivell 6}

entries: {@i tret de Spellcaster a nivell 14}

Choose one school of magic. Whenever the sidekick casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, the sidekick can add its modificador d'habilitat de llançament de conjurs to the spell's damage roll or healing roll, if any.

classFeature.name: Focused Casting
entries: {@i tret de Spellcaster a nivell 20}
Taking damage can't break the sidekick's concentration on a spell.

classFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: {@i tret de Warrior a nivell 1}
The sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw (escull): Força, Destresa, or Constitució.

A més, the sidekick gains proficiency in two skills (escull) from the following list: {@skill Acrobàcies}, {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, i {@skill Survival}.
The sidekick gains proficiency with all armor, and if it is a humanoid or has una arma simple o marcial in its stat block, it gains proficiency with shields and all simple and martial weapons.

classFeature.name: Martial Role
entries: {@i tret de Warrior a nivell 1}
Each warrior focuses on offense or defense in their training. Escull una de les opcions següents::

items.name: Attacker.
items.entry: The sidekick gains a +2 bonus to all attack rolls.

items.name: Defender.
items.entry: The sidekick can use its reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn't the sidekick, provided the sidekick can see the attacker.

classFeature.name: Sidekick Class
entries: {@note Note: this class is intended for NPC {@variantrule sidekicks|tce}.}

classFeature.name: Descans Instantani
entries: {@i tret de Warrior a nivell 2}

The sidekick can use a bonus action on its turn to regain punts de vida equal to {@dice 1d10} + its level en aquesta classe. Once it uses this feature, it must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.
The sidekick can use this feature twice between rests començant a nivell 20.

classFeature.name: Crític millorat
entries: {@i tret de Warrior a nivell 3}
The sidekick's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

entries: {@i tret de Warrior a nivell 6}
The sidekick can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes l'acció {@action Atacar} on its turn.
The number of attacks increases to three when the sidekick reaches 15th level.
If the sidekick has the Multiattack action, it can use Atac Extra or Multiattack on a turn, not both.

Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Cop de Sort
entries: A nivell 20, the sidekick has an uncanny knack for turning failure into success. If the sidekick's attack misses a target within range, it can turn the miss into a hit. Alternativament, if it fails an ability check, it can treat the {@dice d20} roll as a 20.
Once it uses this feature, the sidekick can't use it again until it finishes a short or long rest.

classFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: When the sidekick joins this class, the sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw (escull): Saviesa, Intel·ligència, or Carisma.

A més, the sidekick gains proficiency in three skills (escull) from the following list: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Performance}, {@skill Persuasion}, i {@skill Religion}. If the sidekick is a humanoid, it also gains proficiency with simple weapons and light armor.

classFeature.name: Sidekick Class
entries: To gain the spellcaster class, a creature must have at least one language in its stat block that it can speak.
{@note Note: this class is intended for NPC {@variantrule sidekicks|uasidekicks}.}

classFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: A nivell 1, the sidekick gains the ability to cast spells. (If the creature already has the Spellcasting trait, this feature replaces that trait.) Choose a class: bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard. This choice determines the spell list, habilitat de llançament de conjurs, and spellcasting focus used by the sidekick, as shown on the Spellcasting table.

entries.name: Trucs
entries: At first level, the sidekick knows three cantrips (escull) from its spell list. The sidekick learns additional cantrips (escull) a nivells superiors, que pots veure a la Columna de Trucs Coneguts de la taula de Spellcaster.

entries.name: Ranures de Conjur
entries: The Spellcaster table shows how many ranures de conjur the sidekick has to cast its spellcaster spells de nivells 1 i superior. To cast one of these spells, the sidekick must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. The spellcaster regains all expended ranures de conjur when it finishes a long rest.
For example, if the sidekick knows the 1st-level spell {@spell curar ferides} and has a 1st-level and a 2nd-level spell slot available, it can cast the spell using either slot.

entries.name: Spells Known
entries: The sidekick knows three 1st-level spells (escull) from its spell list.

The Columna de Conjurs Coneguts de la taula de Spellcaster table shows when the sidekick learns more spells (escull). Each of these spells must be of a level for which the sidekick has ranures de conjur, as shown on the. For instance when the sidekick reaches 3rd level en aquesta classe, it can learn one new spell of 1st or 2nd level.

A més, when the sidekick gains a level en aquesta classe, you can choose one of the spells it knows from this class and replace it with another spell from its spell list, which also must be of a level for which it has ranures de conjur.

entries.name: Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: The sidekick's habilitat de llançament de conjurs for these spells depends on the choice you made on the Spellcasting table.

The sidekick uses its habilitat de llançament de conjurs whenever a spell refers to that ability. A més, it uses its modificador d'habilitat de llançament de conjurs when setting the saving throw DC for a spell it casts and when making an attack roll with one.

entries.name: Focus de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: The sidekick can use a focus for its spells depending on the choice you made on the Spellcasting table.

classFeature.name: Magical Recovery
entries: Començant a nivell 2, when the sidekick finishes a short rest, it can recover expended ranures de conjur. The ranures de conjur can have a combined level that is equal to or less than half its level en aquesta classe (arrodonint a l'alça), and none of the ranures de conjur can be 6th level or higher.
Once the sidekick uses this feature, it can't use the feature again until it finishes a long rest.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, i de nou als nivells 8, 12, 16, i 19, the sidekick increases one ability score (escull) by 2, or the sidekick increases two ability scores (escull) by 1. The sidekick can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Truc Potents
entries: Començant a nivell 6, the sidekick can add its modificador d'habilitat de llançament de conjurs to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

entries: A nivell 20, choose two spells that the sidekick knows from this class. Eligible spells are of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd level. The sidekick can cast each of the chosen spell once a nivell 3 sense gastar cap ranura de conjur. After the sidekick casts a spell in this way, the sidekick regains the ability to cast that spell with this feature when it finishes a short or long rest.

classFeature.name: Competències Adicionals
entries: A nivell 1, the sidekick gains proficiency in one saving throw (escull): Força, Destresa, or Constitució.

A més, the sidekick gains proficiency in three skills (escull) from the following list: {@skill Acrobàcies}, {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, i {@skill Survival}. If the sidekick is a humanoid, it also gains proficiency with all armor, shields, and simple and martial weapons.

classFeature.name: Descans Instantani
entries: Començant a nivell 1, the sidekick can use a bonus action on its turn to regain punts de vida equal to {@dice 1d10} + its level en aquesta classe. Once it uses this feature, it must finish a short or long rest before it can use it again.
The sidekick can use this feature twice between rests començant a nivell 18.

entries: Començant a nivell 2, the sidekick has advantage on Destresa saving throws against effects that it can see, such as traps and spells. This feature doesn't work if the sidekick is {@condition incapacitated}.

The number of attacks increases to three when the sidekick reaches 11th level and to four when it reaches 20th level.

The sidekick can use this feature twice between long rests començant a nivell 13 and three times between long rests començant a nivell 17.
